# region

**Interface Property**

A rectangular area on a map, defined by coordinates of the rectangle’s northeast and southwest corners.

## Declaration

```swift
region: CoordinateRegion;
```

## Discussion

The region property is an instance of [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/CoordinateRegion]

## Defining a Camera Boundary

- **mapRect**: A rectangular area on a two-dimensional map projection.

items.description: A rectangular area on a two-dimensional map projection.
